Title: Get Motivated To Do Project-Based Learning Right with Ross Cooper [Encore Episode and the 6th top show of 2017]
Description:
Ross Cooper, the co-author of Hacking PBL, helps us get motivated to think about project-based learning differently.

www.coolcatteacher.com/e215

Today’s episode is sponsored by JAM.com, the perfect last minute holiday gift for your kids or grandkids. The creative courses at Jam.com are project-based, creative and FUN.
